DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether individual access `` 911 '' emergency medical system heart attack severe chest pain receive timely hospital treatment well outcome hospital clinician provide earlier complete electrocardiography ( ECG ) information .
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase III study . Patients randomize ( like toss coin ) 1 2 group : Group 1 : Patients pre-hospital ECG intervention . Group 2 : Patients routine emergency heart care . Information collect time symptom start , clinical management , measure . All patient contact telephone 12 month later interview whether experienced cardiac symptom .
DOC.criteria: All individual Santa Cruz County California call 911 symptom acute coronary syndrome ( chest pain , shortness breath , anginal equivalent ) . Those n't meet inclusion criterion .
